Resource

SARGON Distribution

The SARGON a modular network ontology which defined as a set of Turtle and OWL files. Turtle is a compact textual format that is understood by most Semantic Web tools.

  • Latest Version (1.1):

    • SARGON.ttl
    • SARGON.OWL
